title: Form: Apply for a registration certificate or residence card for a family member: form EEA (FM)
text:
9 June 2016, see all updates Form for a family member of an EEA or Swiss national in the UK to apply for a registration certificate or residence card. Documents PDF , 2.04MB , 91 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. PDF , 270KB , 19 pages This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology. Request an accessible format. If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email . Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use. Details 
Use this form if you are the family member of an EEA national who is exercising Treaty rights in the UK and you wish to apply for a registration certificate (if you’re an EEA national) or residence card (if you’re a non-EEA national) as confirmation of your right of residence in the UK. 
You should also read the guidance notes for detailed information on what to submit with your application. Document information
